name: phonebook-backend
description: A backend for the phonebook frontend from part 2

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../FSO-Exercises/part2/The_Phonebook && npm run build &&cp -r dist ../../../FSO-Phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
